name: Proficient Paddles
description: Proficient Paddles is a super fast-paced arcadey sports game with player customisation, local co-op and many more features!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox One or Xbox 360 Controller Recommended
